price: Pero dijo [Dios]: "¡Oh, fuego! Sé fresco y no dañes a Abraham".
arabic: قُلۡنَا يَٰنَارُ كُونِي بَرۡدٗا وَسَلَٰمًا عَلَىٰٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qul'nā yānāru kūnī bardan wasalāman ʿalā ib'rāhīma
